edu.northwestern.at.utils
Class URLUtils

java.lang.Object
  edu.northwestern.at.utils.URLUtils

public class URLUtils
extends java.lang.Object

URL utilities.

This static class provides various utility methods for manipulating URIs/URLs.

          Don't allow instantiation but do allow overrides.

Get URL from file name or URL.

getFileNameFromURL

public static java.lang.String getFileNameFromURL(java.net.URL url,
                                                  java.lang.String outputDirectoryName)
Get a file name from a URL.

Parameters:
url - The URL.
outputDirectoryName - The output directory name.
Returns:
The file name stripped of its original path with the specified output directory attached.

isURL

public static boolean isURL(java.lang.String possibleURL)
Check if string is a valid URL.

Parameters:
possibleURL - String to check for being a URL.
Returns:
true if string is a URL.
